description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

notes: 計網中心三教111教室,碩博合開

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標：          了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環      境。 課程概要：     利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之      因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題      完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目      標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :   Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics,   the disciples learn to understand the relational   relationship between theory and practice in both   substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete   presentation which includes design result and a report of   the process of the ascertainment will be required for   evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics.  Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

name.zh: 研究方法--文化研究應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).本課程以人文學科領域通用的MLA系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide.  Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 在西方，「傳奇」不像其他的文類般受到認定和推崇，很難將它定位歸類，有點像是古典文類的小跟班。傳奇既沒有悲劇史詩的莊嚴崇高，也沒有抒情詩的優美，更沒有喜劇的逗趣嗆人。但是它卻以通俗文類一脈流傳，一直到二十一世紀。傳奇始於中古世紀，後來並沒有發展成自成一格的文類，反而在寫作和思想上超越了原本的形式，形成了特殊的風格。我們可以說，傳奇入侵其他傳統文類，與之結合，然後重新塑形，因而變化多端，成為現代西方文化中一股無所不在的強大力量。本課程將回顧傳奇的發展史，從中古時期獨樹一格的文類，到了現代發展成具有哲學和詮釋特質的一種形式。我們的重點將探討這之間的變化如何發生? 並研究為何傳奇在西方歷史中歷久不衰，甚至成為我們理解現代西方思想及特色的一扇重要窗口。
description.en: In the West, romance has often seemed to win less acclaim than other genres, a strange younger sister to the celebrated classical forms, not quite as sublime as epic tragedy, not as beautiful as lyric, not as provocative as comedy.  Yet it has nonetheless endured as a popular form into the 21st century.  Evolving since the Middle Ages to become less a genre in its own right than a transcendent mode of writing and of thought which invades, combines, and reshapes the other traditional genres, romance's protean nature has made it an omnipresent and influential force in modern Western culture.  This course will trace the development of romance as a genre and as a philosophical and interpretive mode from the Middle Ages to the present, as we ask how it has changed and why it has persisted throughout Western history, becoming essential to our understanding of thought and of character in the modern West.

description.zh: 科學與技術是了解這個世界和我們自己一項強而有力的工具，而許多作家們對於這樣的情況也在他們的作品中給予各式各樣的回應。在這個課程中我們將學習到作家們如何在他們的作品中使用文學藝術技巧來詮釋與解讀科技與現代文學的相互作用；人類與大自然的關係；以及人類當前的處境。修習這門課程的學生並不需要具備對科學有嚴格的基礎訓練與知識，只要具備強烈的好奇心和求知慾。在課程的一開始我們將藉由閱讀相關作品讓大家熟悉一些重要的議題。課程的中心主題除了針對科學技術與文學的相互關係外，我們也將焦點放在分析文學作品上。我們將繼續探索文學形式與內容的關聯。同時，我們也將利用現代科技在課堂上練習文學作品的即興創作。學生們一開始分析一段正文的內容。然後他們利用這些片段重新組合成一篇新的文本。接著，在這些文本內建立新的超連結︰每當文本被閱讀時，讀者能有多種選擇來閱讀並且使正文成為一個完全新的實體。
description.en: Science and technology are powerful modes of knowing about the world and ourselves, and the rich and varied responses of writers to these ways of knowing. The writers whose works we'll be looking at use art to question the ways that science and technology interact with and alter our understanding of the world, human nature and the human condition. People do not need a formal background in science to enjoy and excel in this course, just a lively intellectual curiosity. A few background essays will help you understand many of the scientific concepts and attitudes we will encounter in the literature we read. While the course does have a central thematic interest in science and technology, our main focus will always be on analyzing literature and its interaction with science and technology. We will continually ask how form, or the construction of a literary work, relates to content, or the meaning of a literary work. This means our main focus will be to analyze the techniques that writers

description.zh: 作為一種智識訓練及針對當代文化與社會所進行之批判研究，後殖民研究早已在世界學術機構，尤其是在英文系裡，建立了紮實的基礎。然而，作為一種批判性的文化概念，「後殖民」一詞的定義在後殖民研究領域的學者之間，卻依然充滿爭議。「後殖民」一詞的複雜性源自於若干特定議題，譬如，當我們在探討異質性的殖民與非殖民的歷史實境時，是否可以將涵蓋性字詞「殖民」與「後殖民」視為二元對立、在時間上可明確切割的概念類別而加以支配應用？是否以往在政治上受殖民的非洲國家、澳洲、孟加拉、加拿大、加勒比海國家、印度、馬來西亞、馬爾他、紐西蘭、巴基斯坦、新加坡、南太平洋島國、斯里蘭卡、及美國，如今都可一併稱為後殖民國家？究竟後殖民是一種穩定的局面，或是隨時可能受到新帝國主義及新殖民主義威脅而改變的狀態？簡言之，何謂後殖民？在一個被廣泛稱為全球化的時代裡，後殖民研究究竟有什麼實際的功用？為了詳加探討這些問題，我們將研讀一些新近的文章，並探討文章作者在使用「後殖民」一詞時，其意義或假定的意義究竟為何？我們可能研讀的批評文章作者包括Edward W. Said、Gayatri Chakravorty Spivak、Homi K. Bhabha、Aijaz Ahmad、Anne McClintock、Vijay Mish
description.en: As an intellectual discipline as well as a critical intervention in contemporary world culture and society, postcolonial studies has been firmly established in academic institutions worldwide, and more so in the departments of English. However, the definition of "the postcolonial" as a critical and cultural concept has remained a controversial issue among practitioners in the field. The complexity of "the postcolonial" arises from the specific issues such as whether the umbrella terms "colonial" and "postcolonial" could be deployed as two binary and chronologically distinct categories when we are dealing with heterogeneous historicities of colonization and decolonization; whether politically ex-colonized African countries, Australia, Bangladesh, Canada, Caribbean countries, India, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Pakistan, Singapore, South Pacific Island countries, Sri Lanka and the USA are now all equally postcolonial; and whether postcoloniality is a stable or volatile condition which m

name.zh: 工作坊:文學與電影製作

description.zh: 本課程採工作坊方式進行，學生需將文學作品轉譯成電影成品。課程之初將擇一文學作品，仔細分析其語言、語調、風格、內涵、人物及主題，然後合力將原作改編成電影腳本，依據電影三元素: 意象、時間和聲音的準則進行拍攝。在實踐的過程中，學生需學習承擔責任與完成任務，藉此加強團隊合作和互信互助的精神，才能克服拍攝過程中的種種困難和技術問題，進而培養運用文字和語言的彈性和創意。
description.en: In this course students will translate a work from one medium-literature-into another medium-film.  Beginning with a careful analysis of the language, tone, style, connotations, characters, and themes in the work of literature, students will then learn about the three basic principles of cinema-Images + Time + Sound-and they will then recreate a version of the original work in the medium of cinema.  This course will demand an emphasis on team-work and mutual trust; an ability to work toward a goal while overcoming numerous practical and aesthetic problems; an ability to be flexible and creative using the basic principles of both literary and cinematic language; and also an ability to acc ept responsibility and to fulfill tasks while working independently.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以X光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：一是結晶學原理、二是X光繞射的原理、三是X光繞射的基本應用、四是材料的結構分析。除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以驗證學理，同學可從實驗中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生問題，從而解決製造的問題。
description.en: Topics covered include properties of X-rays, geometry of crystals, directions of diffracted Beams, intensity of diffracted beams, orientation and quality of single crystals, structure of polycrystalline aggregates, determinations of crystal structure, phase diagram determination, and Experiments.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 工業設計在產品開發上，係一多元素、多因素組合的系統性與整合性工作，其在企業內執行的成敗，關鍵在於：(1)企業組織體系是否能有效應用工業設計的功能，(2)設計部門是否能有效管理控制本身的設計品質，(3)設計行政事務工作(包括人事資料、材料及日程進度等)是否能有效率的管理與執行。因此本課程旨在研究探討設計專業上的高階之管理知識與技能，課程內容包含(1) 設計功能的管理、(2) 設計品質的管理、與(3) 設計行政的管理，課程並輔以實例專案研討驗證。
description.en: Industrial design is an integral activities with in product development. It's effect in organization depends on; 	1.The understanding and the applying of industrial design from    	  the TOP management organization.2.The management of design quality with in the design function. 	3.The efficiency and the effectiveness of design administration.Therefore, the content of this Special will including the theory and practice of 1.The management of design function.2.The management of design quality.3.The management of design administration.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 物件導向程式語言已成為當前軟體發展主流語言，利用抽象、封裝、委任、繼承、多形等特性達成軟體設計的彈性、重複使用性等。隨著軟體規模日漸龐大，軟體工程師需更進一步具備更有效的抽象化與重覆使用設計技術，而設計樣式為當前滿足此目標主要的設計方法。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個樣式導向軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	物件導向式程式設計原理2	單元測試3	設計樣式4	樣式導向設計原理5	樣式導向設計個案研究6	樣式語言7	樣式語言個案研究8	樣式導向軟體設計專題
description.en: Object-oriented programming languages such as C++ and Java have become the main stream in modern software development. Object-orientation makes flexibility and reuse possible through its characteristics of abstraction, encapsulation, delegation, inheritance, and polymorphism. However, as the scale of software increases, software engineers need an even more powerful tool of abstraction and reuse. Design patterns have been established as the main design techniques to achieve reusable object-oriented design. This course aims to establish this core capability. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Principles of object-oriented programming 2	Unit testing3	Design patterns4	Principles of pattern-oriented design5	Case studies in pattern-oriented design6	Pattern languages7	Case studies in Pattern languages8	Term project in pattern-oriented design

description.zh: 現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	通訊軟體特性2	程序式程式設計3	物件式程式設計4	物件導向式程式設計5	泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)6	單元測試7	通訊軟體函式庫8	通訊軟體設計個案研9	通訊軟體設計專題
description.en: Modern communication and signal processing systems rely on the close collaboration of circuits, hardware, and software. Therefore, software design is one of the core capabilities that communication system engineers should possess. This course aims to establish this core capability using C/C++ as the working language. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Characteristics of Communication Software2	Procedure-oriented programming3	Object-based programming4	Object-oriented programming5	Generic programming using C++ Standard Template Library (STL)6	Unit testing7	Communication libraries8	Case studies in communication software design9	Term project in communication software design

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹平行處理的理論﹑硬体技術及可擴充式平行計算機結構 1. 平行理論: ．平行計算機模型 ．程式及網路特性 ．系統性能計算 2. 硬体技術 ．超能量處理器 ．ＶＬIＷ架構 ．向量處理器 ．共享式記憶体架構 ．超管線處理器3. 平行計算機結構 ．多重處理器系統 ．多向量處理器及ＳＩＭＤ電腦 ．多線式處理器 ．資料流處理器架構
description.en: This course introduces the following topics of parallel processing: theory of parallelism ,Hardware technologies, and parallel Architecture. The detail for each topic is as follows: 1.Theory of parallelism. parallel computer model .program and Network properties .principles of scalable performance 2. Hardware technology. superscalar processor .VLIW Architecture. Vector processor. shared memory organization. superpipelined processor 3. Parallel architecture .multiprocessor system. multivector and SIMD computers .multithread architecture Dataflow architecture.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

name.zh: 行動網際網路技術與應用

description.zh: 本課程的目的在協助學生了解新興及行動通訊產業的技術基礎及未來應用發展。希望藉由課程討論激發與課人員探討無線科技能產生的新應用並進一步以小組專案方式擬出行動應用可行的商業方案。主要課題包括：1.無線通訊系統演進簡介2.無線/公眾區域網路技術與應用3.行動通訊系統技GSM/GPRS/3G 4.行動加值服務應用與規劃5.加值服務商業模式探討6.行動商務及行動付款服務規劃7.行動定位服務探討8.第三代行動通訊概況
description.en: This course focused at the Mobile Internet both Technology and Application related topics. It is designed to bridge the GAP between Internet and Mobile communication (both Wireless LAN & Cellular communication) using system architecture and value-added services examples. The discussion topics will include: 1.Overview of Wireless Communication Systems 2.[Public]Wireless LAN Technology/System Architecture & Applications 3.Introduction of Cellular communication: GSM/GPRS/3G 4.Mobile Value-Added Service (M-VAS) Planning 5.M-VAS Business Model discussion 6.Mobile Commerce & Mobile Payment 7.Mobile Positioning System & Location-Base Service 8. 3G Service NOW

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念與技術。學生將學習開發高品質軟體相關的原理、觀念、方法、與技術。本課程將介紹下列主題：一、軟體工程簡介二、軟體流程模型三、需求工程四、軟體設計方法五、物件導向軟體開發六、軟體測試與驗證七、軟體品質確保八、軟體維護九、軟體專案管理與規劃十、軟體工程進階主題
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.An Overview of Software Engineering2.Software Process Models3.Requirements Engineering4.Software Design Methods5.Object-Oriented Software Development6.Software Testing Strategy and Tactics7.Software Quality Assurance8.Software Maintenance9.Software Project Management and Planning10.Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

description.zh: 1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

notes: 新聘教師1, 光電系4樓電化教室

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括：1.污水下水道系統規則  2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general designing concept of wastewater treatment system, and makes student to understand how to make a design of wastewater treatment system, which combine quality, economizatin and high efficiency. The contents of the course include:rules of sewerage system, design of pipe system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 自動化機械簡介，規劃及設計，驅動器，感測器可程式控制，氣液壓迴路控制，電腦介面控制，自動化系統實例介紹及應用。
description.en: Introduction ， design  and  planning  for  Automatic  machine ， Actuators  sensors ， PLC ， pneumatic  control ， PC - based  control ， Examples  for  Automatic  system  and  its  application .

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹嵌入式系統設計之基本原理與方法,以使學生瞭解如何使用軟/硬體元件來設計嵌入式系統。課程內容包含:1.嵌入式系統之基本介紹2.客戶單一目的處理器(硬體)3.通用型處理器(軟體)4.標準單一目的處理器(周邊)5.記憶體6.介面7.設計實例-數位相機及PDA 8.IC設計技術9.設計方法10.ARM嵌入式微處理器之介紹11.ARM嵌入式微處理器之應用12軟硬體共同設計簡介13.SOC嵌入式系統簡介
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduction a methodology and theory of embedded system design.Then student can using hardware/software components to design an embedded system. The content of this course are shown as follows:1.An Introduction to Embedded System. 2.Custom Single-Purpose Processor:Hardtware. 3.General Puprose Processor:Software  4.Standard  Single-Purpose Process:Peripherals 5.Memory 6.Interfacing 7.Example-Digital Camera and PDA 8.IC Technology 9.Design Technology  10.ARM Embedded Microprocessor 11.ARM Embedded Microprocessor Applications 12. Introduction to Hardware/Software Co-Design 13. Introduction to Embedded System of System-on Chip

description.zh: 本課程以講授計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到幾種目前廣泛使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器用的路由協定為主。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer.  Popular physical layer medias are discussed first.  Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion.  Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 本課程旨於深入探討如何利用數學方法來分析並了解工程上之問題之數學模式，藉以「線性轉換」、「向量分析」、「微分算子」與「複變分析」等四大內容，以及其應用方法。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on "linear transformation", "vector analysis", "differential operator" and "complexanalysis" to analysis and modeling the engineering problems.

description.zh: 1.幾何光學2.波動光學3.光束光學4.傅氏光學5.光電磁學6.偏極光學與晶體光學
description.en: 1. Ray Optics2. Wave Optics3. Beam Optics4. Fourier Optics5. Electromagnetic Optics6. Polarization and Crystal Optics

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5)	截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

name.zh: 液晶顯示器驅動電子學

description.zh: 1.液晶材料的種類 2.液晶物理特性 3. 液晶顯示模式4. 薄膜電晶體元件物理4. 薄膜電晶體操作特性 5. 像素的結構及佈局 7. 顯示器的等效電路模型8. 顯示器驅動原理 9. 響應時間的驅動補償
description.en: 1. Types of liquid crystals  2. Physics of liquid crystals  3. Display modes and electro-optical properties  4. Properties of a-Si Thin film transistors  5. Operation of TFTs  6. Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池與太陽能光譜，2. 太陽能電池材料特性，3. 產生、結合與太陽能電池元件物理，4. 轉換效率、損失與量測，5. 矽太陽能電池技術，6. 化合物與多接面太陽能電池技術，7. 先進太陽能電池技術，8. 太陽能系統與應用。
description.en: 1 Introduction of Solar Cells and Sunlight, 2. Review of Solar Cell Material Properties, 3. Generation, Recombination, and Device Physics, 4. Conversion Efficiency Limits, Losses, and Measurement, 5. Silicon Solar Cell Technology, 6. Compound Material and Multi-Junction Solar Cell Technology, 7. Advance Solar Cells, 8. Solar Cell Systems and Applications.

description.zh: 每週六小時二學分的專業必修課，旨在訓練碩一新生能在短時間內學習各種生物科技必須且基本的實驗技術並能有通盤的了解。課程的安排除了在生物科技所的教授實驗室中學習外，也將安排學生至中央研究院、國立臺灣大學、長庚大學及醫院、國防醫學大學及業界生物科技公司學習先進的生物科技的實驗方法和技術。
description.en: This course will provide students to learn essential and basic methods and experiments in biotechnology. The students must learn the methods and experiments in laboratories of the professors in Institute of Biotechnology, Academia Sinica, National Taiwan University, Chang Gung University, National Defense University and biotech companies.

description.zh: 本課程主要提供學生在生物化學上幾個選擇性主題較深的知識。包括:蛋白質結構和功能、蛋白質輸送、蛋白質分解、接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: This course provides students with a depth of knowledge of a number of selected topics in biochemistry. It Including of protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; bioenergetics including photosynthesis; metabolic and genetic regulation;; biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.zh: 平面顯示器原理與技術
name.en: Principle of Flat Panel Display Technology

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: Introduction of the theories and technologies of flat panel display and the future development of flat display technology.  1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料

Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。

description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理3.電子擾繞射理論4.電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。五、相變化動力學簡介。六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en: 1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application2.One component system3.Two component system4.Three component system。5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
description.en: The course aims to advance students' knowledge of the physics underlying different applied geophysical methods and how the methods are used for exploration, geotechnics, and characterization.  We will cover the theories and modeling techniques of seismic refraction, seismic reflection, heat flow, gravity, and magnetics methods.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的化學反應動力學有基本的認識。本課程的主要目的在於教導學生如何設計一個程序以進行所要的化學反應。進行此類程序設計必須要將物理程序與化學程序的速率式相結合。而相關的基本原理包括：物理程序的能量傳送及質量傳送原理，及化學程序的反應動力學。為了達到這個目的，學生要對化學反應的本徵反應速率及程序的輸送現象有基本的認識。此外，本課程亦將介紹反應器設計的基本原理。據此，本課程的教學內容包括：1.	化學反應動力學2.	理想反應器的基本質量守恆3.	等溫與非等溫反應器原理4.	非均質反應程序、觸媒與吸附理論
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of chemical kinetics is essential. The major objective of this course is to learn how to design a process for carrying out desirable chemical reaction. To design this process requires rates of both physical and chemical processes. The principles governing such physical processes as energy transfer and mass transfer are often as important as those which govern chemical kinetics. To combine the rates of chemical and physical process, the essential feature is to understand the intrinsic rate of chemical reaction and the transport phenomena of the process. In addition, the basic principles of reactor design will also be introduced based on abovementioned fundamental principles. Therefore, the contents of this course include:1.	chemical kinetics2.	fundamentals of mass conser

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 良好的介面設計，能讓使用者快速有效的完成相關操作行為，加強使用過程的正面經驗。本互動程式設計之課程內容旨在專注於以適切的程式撰寫能力，完成介面與使用者有效溝通的相關課題。課程內容包含遠端網路操作介面之程式設計、手持式電子產品之程式設計、大型互動裝置之程式設計等。程式學習如Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++。
description.en: Good interface design would help users operate efficiently and create a positive experience in the whole operation process. This course focuses on the appropriate programming design ability that establishes an efficient communication between interface and users. Course content includes programming design of remote internet operation interface, handheld electric products, large interactive device, and so forth. Programming acquisition include Action Script / JAVA / JSP / ASP / MY SQL / C / C++.

description.zh: 本課程在探討多媒體技術應用於各互動媒體設計與實作，首先介紹多媒體技術之基本理論及一些處理技巧，其中多媒體影像包含影像編輯、製作、轉換與格式介紹等。為因應研究生的不同專業領域，本課程將強調基本知識的培養與技術的訓練， 例如：有關Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, After Effects.等技能的養成。
description.en: This course is focused on the application and design practice of interactive digital multimedia technologies. The contents include basic knowledge and techniques on image editing, making, transforming and format introduction. To meets different students' background, this course emphasizes on the understanding of basic training on software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D Max, Sketch up, Flash, and After Effects.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

name.en: Special Topics on Mechanical & Electric engineering   (一)

description.zh: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課，課程討主要內容介紹機電科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，側重在機電科技與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course, conducted by several professors from the Institute of. Mechanical & Electric Engineering introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of mechatronics and advanced technology. The topics covered mainly lie in areas of automation technology, mechatronics, advanced manufacturing technology, air conditioning & refrigeration engineering and vehicle engineering.

description.zh: 由於經濟活動的急遽擴張，大量生產、大量消費的生活型態，產生大量廢棄物，導致環境負擔超過涵容及復原能力，加上台灣地狹人稠，自然資源不豐，造成環境品質惡化及發展遲滯危機，因此，如何突破天然資源限制，開創永續發展動能，以建設舒適美好生活環境，實為當前重要課題。本課程分別從污染防治、生化程序控制、材料製程應用及災害防治等工程技術觀點著手，培養具永續發展之經營管理智能。
description.en: Because of fast economic development of the modern society, our environment has been deteriorated due to the massive waste production from these economic activities.  Therefore, how to recover and provide the best environment from engineering point of view is a very critical issue.  This course will provide specific knowledge base to these advanced students from pollution control, chemical process, disaster prevention and material engineering points of view in order to minimize waste production before, during and after the production process.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.en: 候補

description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育哲學架構，課程包 括三大部份，第一部份探討哲學的基本課題與哲學和教育的關係；第 二部份探討傳統和當代教育哲學所面對的基本問題，以及它們對教育 實務所能提供的回應之道；第三部份涉及發展個人教育哲學之重要，方法與推行時可能受到的挑戰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The goal of this course is to offer a conceptual frame of educational philosophy. The course is divided into three sections. Part I deals with basic issuers in philosophy and the relationship between philosophy and education. Part II is a survey of how traditional and modern philosophies have faced the basic philosophic issuers, and the alternatives they have developed for educational practice. Part III discusses the need for developing personal philosophy of education, some ways of building such a philosophy, and some of the challenges involved in implementing that philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在提供有志從事教育工作的學生有關教育心理學的系統知識使其在未來從事教職時，具最有效的方法瞭解，敘述，預測及其學生的行為並從而採用最佳的教學方式，以達成教育目標。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the systematic knowledge of educational psychology to the students who have the willingness to be teachers. It presents the students with the basic psychology theories of instructional process; mental-physical development; the principles of learning and instruction; the learning about motor and skill, words and concepts; cultivating of thinking and creative; motivation and interest in instructing process; the measurement of individual difference; proper instructions against differently mental students; teacher-student relationship and students behaviors; instruction evaluation; mental hygiene and health in school. After finishing this course, the persons will get the most effective methods to understand, describe or predict their students behaviors, and can choose the best instructional ways achieve the educational goal, when they become teachers in the future.

name.en: Materials and Methods of Teaching for Various Subjects

description.zh: 不同的課目有著不同的教學方式，及教學原理。本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生對其專業科目的特殊教學法有進一步的了解。使得在任教此一科目時能運用更適切適當的教學方法提高學生學習的效果。
description.en: There are different teaching styles and teaching theories for different courses. The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

The purpose for this course will let student know every different teaching style and theory for every different course. After finishing this course, the students will become a more professional teacher.

description.zh: 讓學生對教育有總合而初步的認識，以培養初任教師的共信與共識。以及引起學生研習教育的興趣，以奠定其將來繼續研習之基礎。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers a introduction to students about the idea of general education and gives students some motivation about learning how to teach.

description.zh: 目前國內教育制度僅為三成的學生而設計，忽略了多數七成技職學生的教育需求，造成今日升學風氣瀰漫，學校未能正常教學，以及社會普遍以文憑用人之不當偏差現象。本課程即針對以下未來技職教育的重點以下未來技職教育的重點做概況性的介紹:1.彈性調整技職學制，暢通學生進修管道。2.落實職業証照制度，提昇技職教育尊嚴。3.規劃高職免試入學方案，紓解國中生升學壓力。4.試辦綜合高中課程實驗，輔導技職教育精緻發展。5.加強技職教育宣導，建立正確職業價值觀念。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: This course offers a introduction about technical and vocational education as following (a) flexible adjustment the system of technical and vocational education and making the student learning smoothly in technical and vocational education (b) emphasizing vocation license system; giving more respect to technical and vocational education .(c) planning about no examination into middle-vocational school to relive the pressure of studying (d) try the variety middle school course and make the technical and vocational education better. (f) emphasis the technical and vocational education advertisement, establish the right idea about technical and vocational education.

description.zh: 學生探討主題可包含當前中等教育重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of major research regarding contemporary trends, issues and programs in secondary education. Students expected to select contemporary issues of secondary education into their current research interests. Discussion, case study and reporting are required.

description.zh: 「輔導工作是所有教育工作者的責任」。任何人都會遭遇問題，成長中的學生尤其有各式各樣的問題。身為人師，在教學過程中應輔導學生解決問題，以培養健康進取，有能力解決問題，適應環境的學生為己任。在本課程的目標即在透過對青春期挫折徵候的了瞭以及學者心理分析輔導法、個體心理輔導法、存在主義輔導法、理情輔導法、認知輔導法、溝通分析輔導法、行為輔導法等輔導理論，並配合實例分析使未來之教育工作人員獲得工作時的輔導知能以及培養輔導工作的志趣。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: When teaching, the teachers should keep in mind the duty to guide their students to overcome the frustration or to solve the difficult problems as to nurture the students to be healthy, positive, with their own abilities to overcome difficulties and to be apt to their environment. The object of this subject is to help the students with the willingness to be teachers get the knowledge and abilities of guidance on their teaching in the future, and develop their willingness and interests of guidance. This course presents the students with the units including to understand the symptom of adolescent frustration, the method of person-center approach, the method of rational-emotive therapy, the method of cognitive guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance the method of transactional analysis guidance, the method of behavior guidance. In addition, this course also introduces many practical cases so that the students can more effectively study the relative theories.

description.zh: （一）瞭解青少年發展的意義與內涵。（二）瞭解青少年發展理論及實務，（三）培養青少年發展與輔導的基本能力。課程內容包括：青少年的定義與內涵、青少年發展的理論模式、青少年的生理發展與輔導、青少年的智能發展與輔導、青少年的社會化發展與輔導、青少年的情緒發展與輔導、青少年的人格發展與輔導、青少年的道德發展與輔導、青少年的生涯發展與輔導。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition and essence of adolescence development, (1) understands the theory and application of adolescence development, (3) cultivate the fundamental capability of adolescence development and guidance. It covers the definition and essence of adolescence, theory of adolescence development and guidance, physiology development and guidance of adolescence, intelligence development and guidance of adolescence, socialization development and guidance of adolescence, emotion development and guidance of adolescence, personality development and guidance of adolescence, moral development and guidance of adolescence, and career development and guidance of adolescence.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下:(一)充實學生各種激發快樂學習、健康成長的學識，以培養適任的優良教師；（二）提供學生班級教學及班級導師工作的實務經驗與做法，使具備有效處理教學與班級事務的良好技能﹔(三)奠定學生熱忱積極經營班級之理念，養成學生教育專業精神，使其在從事教育工作時能發揮愛心與熱忱來欣賞及參與班級的各種活動。 本課程的內容涵蓋班級經營的學理基礎;班級經營的目標、計劃與評鑑;教學、行政之經營;導師的任務與素養;學生自治活動、教學情境佈置;班級氣氛與學習;班級的評量設計;有關安置、生活、學習、行為等方面的問題與對策等 本課程利用講授法、小組討論法、發表法等方式進行教學，盡量在教學過程中探討教室內各種發生的狀況尋求最佳解決方式，且進行發展積極、和諧、快樂的師生互動模式之探討以利學生在未來擔任教師時能駕輕就熟於班級經營工作，而達成本課程之目標 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(備註：本資料係由本校各教學單位、教務處課務組、進修部教務組、進修學院教務組及計網中心所共同提供！本資料僅供參考，正式資料仍以教務處、進修部、進修學院所公佈之書面資料為準。
本課程的目標在使未來即將擔任教職的學生能夠利用多媒體電腦做為教學上的輔助工具。課程的重點主要在介紹 MS Office PowerPoint 應用程式在教學上的應用。
