description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習供應鏈的運籌管理、策略設計、規劃與營運的相關議題，以及瞭解供應鏈中各成員間對於物流、資訊流與金流的活動與管理。課程內容包含：供應鏈的競爭策略擬定、配送網路設計、需求預測、總體規劃、存貨管理、運輸管理、委外決策與規劃、資訊科技應用、與供應鏈協同整合。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the strategic design, planning and operation of a supply chain, as well as the efficient management of the flows of product, information, funds in a supply chain. The content includes the strategic fit between competitive strategies and supply chain strategies of firms, the design of supply chain networks, demand forecasting, aggregate planning, inventory management, transportation management, sourcing decision and planning, information technology, and coordination and integration of supply chain members.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis. Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed. It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種運輸系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運輸系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的網路均衡分析。課程內容包含：運輸網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡交通量指派、動態網路分析、最佳化車輛路線求解以及運輸網路模擬等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the models and algorithms for transportation system analysis. In addition to discussing the supply and demand sides of transportation systems, this course aims to analyze and solve for the network equilibrium between supply and demand. The main topics include, but not limited to, transportation network design, analysis, and optimization, queueing theory, network equilibrium traffic assignment, dynamic network analysis, vehicle routing and scheduling, and network simulation.

description.zh: 網際網路的變化快速且所使用的技術也日新月益。現今網際網路已成為人們生活中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹網際網路上架構與應用的各種設計觀念。本課程的組成包括以下八類的原理介紹：一、網際網路架構；二、連上網際網路的各種方法；三、網際網路通訊的各種項目；四、WWW；五、網際網路上的各種應用工具；六、網際網路上多媒體應用；七、企業內部網路；八、網際網路上的資訊安全。
description.en: The Internet changes so quickly and the technology advances rapidly. Now, the Internet has become an essential part of our life. The goal of the course is breadth to cover the principles of the Internet. The content of this course is composed of the following eight parts. In Part 1, the underlying basics of the Internet is explained. Part 2 depicts the various ways you can connect your computer to the Internet. Part 3 covers every aspect of Internet communications. Part 4 covers what has become by far the most popular part of the Internet--WWW. Part 5 takes a close look at common Internet tools. Part 6 shows you how some of the various multimedia technologies of the Internet work. Part 7 covers intranets, how the Internet works with the outside world, and how you can shop online. Finally, Part 8 covers security concerns.

description.zh: 中文概述Chinese Description 	1. 多媒體資料形式與儲存方式之研究 2. 網路多媒體資料傳輸方式之研究 3. 分散式多媒體資料管理技術之研究 4. 多媒體管理資訊系統之研究 5. 超媒體資料管理之研究 6. 網際網路多媒體資訊管理之研究 7. 企業內網路多媒體資訊管理之研究 8. 多媒體技術在商業自動化之應用 9. 多媒體技術在生產系統之應用
description.en: The Multimedia Information Management Course is to study the techniques for managing multimedia information and its applications on the commerce automation and production systems. The course includes the following topics: 1. Multimedia information format and storage policy 2. Network flow management for multimedia information 3. Distributed multimedia information management techniques 4. Multimedia management information systems 5. Hypermedia information management techniques 6. World wide web multimedia information management techniques 7. Intranet multimedia information management techniques 8. Applications of multimedia techniques on commerce automation 9. Applications of multimedia techniques on production systems

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 教導學生認識色彩之成因及視覺現象、色彩系統之認識及色彩心理之種種現象。
description.en: Basic understanding about color. Including light, visual perception, color names, color order systems.

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面的構成練習、以及造形與色彩的研究達到設計感覺的養成並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之設計訓練的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basical equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 在工程科學方面最錯綜複雜的問題之一是它對人類社會的影響力，本課程先從學理上探討科技工程與人文倫理的關連，鼓勵同學廣泛閱讀，多方面吸收新知識，進而對各種不同的情境與個案，提出客觀的分析與評價，並建立主觀上認知。更結合各方面的專業領域例如醫療概念、商業道德，和法律概念來強調日新月異新開發的工程技術下不能被忽略倫理道德。並藉由此課程盼望同學對專業化知識帶及社會的進步與安定有更寬廣認知。
description.en: One of the most complicated issues in engineering is its impact to human society. Engineering ethics is attracting increasing interest throughout many well-developed industrial countries. As a response to this concern, a new discipline, engineering ethics, is emerging for undergraduate engineering courses. This discipline combined well-established fields such as medical ethics, business ethics, and legal ethics, with emphasis on ethical issues raised by new advanced technology in engineering. The major aim of the course is to help engineering students gain a broad understanding of professionalism and its vital contribution to society.

description.zh: 本課程先從學理上探討科技工程與人文倫理的關連，鼓勵同學廣泛閱讀，多方面吸收新知識，進而對各種不同的情境與個案，提出客觀的分析與評價，並建立主觀上認知。課程上針對實用的主題，也會邀請學有專精有實務應用的賢達人士，提供知識與經驗的交流。課堂上除了知識的講授，強調師生之間的討論，也成立專題學習小組，以兩三人為一個專題學習小組，以案例分析的方式，促進同學之間的相互學習，發揮團隊合作的精神。專題報告要選擇實用的議題，學術討論外，力求實務化與生活化，盼望藉著同學的專題報告，提昇同學的溝通表達的能力和研究評析的能力，以及判斷抉擇的能力。
description.en: One of the most current issues in engineering is its involvement with the problems of ethics and values. Engineering ethics is attracting increasing interest among colleges of engineering and universities throughout the well-developed high-tech countries. The increasing concern for the ethic and value dimensions of engineering is, at least in part, a result of the attention that the media has given to cases such as the Challenger disaster of the NASA, the public safety of poor infrastructure, the collapse of buildings in the 921 earthquake, and the environmental pollution due to oil spill. As a response to this concern, a new discipline, engineering ethics, is emerging for undergraduate engineering courses. This discipline will doubtless take its place alongside such well-established fields as medical ethics, business ethics, and legal ethics. This course aims to help engineering students gain a broad understanding of professionalism and its vital contribution to society

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 介紹有機化學原理及應用於材料科學之場合

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development. We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study. (1) Economics of the global textile industry. (2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry. (3) The evolution of competitive strategies. (4) Countermeasures for industry. Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service. Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生撰寫及處理各類商用文書之能力，透過各類專業文體的講授及寫作練習，使學生熟悉各類商用文書術語、文體及文件的應用。
description.en: This course aims at developing students' English writing skills in writing English business letters for various occasions; it is intended to familiarize students with business technical terms and varying types of business letters and documents and to increase their ability to apply them in authentic situations.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

notes: B班,期中考後AB班學生對調

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

notes: B班,期中考後AB班學生對調

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
description.en: This course will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of Physicochemical treatment process rather than operations, thus encompassing quality transformation in natural waters, water supply, and municipal and industrial wastewaters.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

name.zh: 室內空氣品質控制與管理
name.en: Indoor Air Quality Control and management

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.zh: 液晶顯示器驅動電子學

description.zh: 1.液晶材料的種類 2.液晶物理特性 3. 液晶顯示模式4. 薄膜電晶體元件物理4. 薄膜電晶體操作特性 5. 像素的結構及佈局 7. 顯示器的等效電路模型8. 顯示器驅動原理 9. 響應時間的驅動補償

Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池工作原理，2. 半導體材料與模型，3. 理想轉換效率，4. 單晶矽太陽能電池，5. 薄膜太陽能電池，6. 太空與聚光太陽能電池，7. 有機與敏染太陽能電池。
description.en: 1 Principles of Solar Cells Operation, 2. Semiconductor Material and Modeling, 3. Ideal Conversion Efficiency, 4. Crystalline Silicon Solar Cels, 5. Thin Film Solar Cell Technology, 6. Space and Concentrator Cells, 7. Organic and Dye Sensitised Cells.

description.zh: (1) 有線電視系統(2) 光纖有線電視系統(3) 混合式光纖/同軸電纜網路(4) 光纖到家/寬頻整體服務(5) 光發射機/光接收機之設計與製作(6) 光放大器特性(7) 光纖有線電視系統實務設計(8) 光纖有線電視系統量測與維護(9) 1550 nm 長距離傳輸光纖有線電視系統(10) 高密度分波多工系統

name.en: Theory and Applications of Optical Fibers

description.zh: 光纖是光纖通信及光電應用中非常重要的元件。在本課程裡，我們將先介紹光的基本概念、然後是光纖材料與製成技術、光纖結構與傳播原理、傳播特性與分析、非線性特性、和有關的系統與應用。其中所討論的標題包含：(1)電磁波傳播之回顧(2)平板波導(3)單階折射率光纖(4)光纖的特性與分析(5)漸階折射率光纖(6)光纖於光纖通信之應用(7)光纖感測器之介紹(8)光纖光柵之介紹
description.en: This course provides the basics of light propagation in fibers; these include fundamental waveguiding concepts, the influence of various fiber structures, material properties of light transmission, and related devices and systems. The following topics will be introduced:(1) Review of electromagnetic wave propagation, (2) Slab waveguides, (3) Optical fibers with single-step index profiles, (4) Loss and dispersion in optical fiber, (5) Nonlinear effects in fiber (I), (6) Nonlinear effects in fiber (II), (7) Introduction to fiber sensors, (8) Introduction to fiber gratings.

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2.	explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

description.zh: 1.介紹視窗程式語言及其物件導向特性 2.基礎視窗程式設計 3.動態連結程式庫之程式設計 4.視窗圖形使用者界面設計 5.視窗I/O界面設計 6.多媒體程式寫作 7.DDE與OLE之程式設計 8.視窗多執行緒之程式設計
description.en: 1. introduction to windows programming language and its object-oriented design 2. fundamental windows programming 3. programming with dynamic-link library 4. design of windows GUI 5. windows I/O interface programming 6. multi-media programming 7. programming with DDE and OLE 8. windows programming with multithreads.

name.zh: 行動網際網路技術與應用

description.zh: 本課程的目的在協助學生了解新興及行動通訊產業的技術基礎及未來應用發展。希望藉由課程討論激發與課人員探討無線科技能產生的新應用並進一步以小組專案方式擬出行動應用可行的商業方案。主要課題包括：1.無線通訊系統演進簡介2.無線/公眾區域網路技術與應用3.行動通訊系統技GSM/GPRS/3G 4.行動加值服務應用與規劃5.加值服務商業模式探討6.行動商務及行動付款服務規劃7.行動定位服務探討8.第三代行動通訊概況
description.en: This course focused at the Mobile Internet both Technology and Application related topics. It is designed to bridge the GAP between Internet and Mobile communication (both Wireless LAN & Cellular communication) using system architecture and value-added services examples. The discussion topics will include: 1.Overview of Wireless Communication Systems 2.[Public]Wireless LAN Technology/System Architecture & Applications 3.Introduction of Cellular communication: GSM/GPRS/3G 4.Mobile Value-Added Service (M-VAS) Planning 5.M-VAS Business Model discussion 6.Mobile Commerce & Mobile Payment 7.Mobile Positioning System & Location-Base Service 8. 3G Service NOW

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

notes: 與研究所合開,英文授課

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

name.zh: 數位電視之多媒體技術
name.en: Multimedia Techniques for Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB)

description.zh: 一、	歐規數位電視（DVB-T/H）簡介二、	影音訊號簡介三、	影音訊號壓縮原理四、	Reed-Solomon 錯誤更正碼五、	H.264視訊編解碼六、	HE AAC v2 音訊編解碼七、	數位電視之傳輸串流八、	解碼MPE/MPE-FEC九、	解碼RTP/RTCP十、	解碼FLUTE/SDP
description.en: 1. Introduction to Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB-T/H) systems2. Introduction to video and audio signals3. Fundamentals of video and audio compression techniques4. Reed-Solomon error correction codes5. H.264 video coding6. HE AAC v2 audio coding7. Transport stream in the DVB-T/H systems8. Decoding MPE/MPE-FEC9. Decoding RTP/RTCP10. Decoding FLUTE/SDP

description.zh: 本課程將概述多媒通訊系統所用到的各項技術，包括語音與樂音壓縮，影像與視訊壓縮，數位傳輸，網路多媒體，多媒體安全，多媒體資料庫等。我們特別以國際標準為例來解說各項技術的原理和應用。最後，我們也介紹完整的系統規格，如數位電視和MPEG系統。
description.en: This course provides a compressive coverage of the multimedia communication systems. Various key technologies such as speech/audio compression, image/video compression, digital transmission, multimedia over networks, multimedia security, and multimedia database systems are introduced. Particularly, the international standards on multimedia representation and processing are discussed in depth. In addition, the digital broadcast TV (DVB, ATSC) and MPEG system standards are also included.

description.zh: 1.軟體架構總覽 2.Client-server式架構 3.Model-view-controller式架構 4.n層式架構 5.Peer-to-peer式架構 6.式樣導向式架構 7.Pipes and filter 式架構特論
description.en: 1.Software architecture-overview 2.Client-Server 3.Model-view-controller 4.n-Tier design 5.Peer-to-peer 6.Pattern-oriented software architecture 7.Special Topics:pipes and filter

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 負責教授同意。介紹現代化的電腦整合製造系統及機械製造工程師的主要任務－工作準備、製造、安裝及檢驗。同時，簡介機械製造工程師必備的知識：如重要的工程材料；機械加工重要程序之原理，包括材料成形，變形，去除，連接及表面處理等技術；工作機械之構造及其控制技術（機械式、油壓式及數值控制）；自動化生產系統；量測技術及品管。
description.en: Introduction to Modern Computer Integrated Manufacturing System and Manufacturing Planning, Manufacturing Operation, Assembly and Inspection. Meanwhile, discuss the essential knowledge of manufacturing engineer, Engineering Materials, Principles of Manufacturing Process, as Casting, Forming, Material-Removing, Joining and Surface Technology, Machine Tool Structures and its control Technologies, Automatic Production Systems, Metrology and Quality Control.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導；對流原理，強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式；輻射熱傳遞；凝結與沸騰；熱交換器；熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction- Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
description.en: This is a French language course for beginners. By keeping their interests in study French, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of French language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand French culture. This course contains: 1. Personal expression (names, numbers, body, occupation, age etc.) 2.Family (relatives, house, personality, studying, introduction etc.) 3.daily conversation (give a phone call, thanks, apologize, discussion about weather, Activities, dating, dining, invitation etc.)

description.zh: 分別依歷史及關係、研究方向而分類基本性質。物質之基本構成原理。各以非金屬材料為主，輔以金屬材料，除以理論定義、性質、配試驗及計標來教授學習者研究瞭解如何鑑定選材適用，達到品質要求。
description.en: Physical,chemical,and molecular properties of materials commonly employed in civil engineering works.Influence of these properties on the performance and use of materials. Emphasis on laboratory evaluation of properties that control the performance of materials.

description.zh: 混凝土及其材料，磚石、木材、瀝青、鋼筋等土木工程材料各種性質之試驗方法，儀器之使用及實習。
description.en: Laboratory tests of concrete and its materials, Brick and stone,Wood,Asphalt,Reinforcing steel and other materials of Civil Engineering,Include test procedures,instrumentation,and interpretation of results.

description.zh: 本課程教授材料力學之基本理論及定理包含：(1)應力與應變、(2)抗拉試驗試驗與虎克定律、(3)扭矩、(4)剪力與彎矩、(5)梁之應力分析、(6)梁之撓度、(7)柱之挫屈 。
description.en: The contents of this course are listed as follows:1.Stress and Strain2.Mechanical Properties of Materials3.Torsion4.Pure Bending5.Traverse Loading6.Transformation of Stress and Strain7.Design and Deflections of Beam and Shahts8.Buckling of Columns9.Energy Methods

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Economics can be said to be satisfaction of wants by the allocation of scarce factors. Construction economy introduces various methods of financial cash flow to analyze the priority of infrastructures. Moreover, it provides a systematic framework for evaluating the economic aspects of competing design solutions.

description.zh: 在目前資訊爆增的社會中，從事教學工作確實不是一件很輕鬆的工作。當今國內的教育方式是大量的資訊必須利用有限的時間，在指定的空間內，傳播給必須接受者。此一工作勢必要借助於相當妥善的媒介或手段才能做到。因此，從事教育工作者如何研究和運用適切的媒體來教學已成為不可忽視的課題。本課程的重點在介紹教學媒體的涵義、分類與功能、如何進行教學傳播，以及媒體教學的基本理論。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Mitigation of Soil and Water Hazards

description.zh: 本課程將包含土壤沖蝕、小流域流量之推求、模型理論、輸砂理論、防洪工程、排水工程、土石流、防災技術、減災與偵測及專題討論。
description.en: Introduction; Soil erosion; Rational formula; Sediment transport; Flood control; Drainage engineering; Debris flow; Techniques of disaster prevention; Seminar.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和GPS資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要綜述土木工程概況及其在社會中所扮演的角色。課程內容包含：土木工程歷史概述、建造環境、重大工程（如：壩、隧道、自來水供給與運輸系統）對於社會與環境之影響、工程業務規章、永續發展、公平與道德價值、近代工程發展問題和未來的挑戰。課程目標為使學生瞭解土木工程師如何影響社會文明的發展，並加強學生對自身社會的關懷，與對本科歷史的認識、探討工程師及專業人士在其專精領域中的倫理關係及近代工程發展對社會生活型態、法律財經及環境生態的影響與未來二十一世紀土木工程所面臨的挑戰等問題。
description.en: Engineering and Society (3 credits, 3 hours/week)The course provides a general overview of engineering, in particular civil engineerin. Topics include a historical outline of civil engineering, the built environment, societal and environmental impacts of major civil engineering projects such as bridges, building, dams, tunnel, water supply systems and transportation systems, regulation of engineering practice, sustainable development, equity and ethics, contemporary issues involving civil engineering and challenges for the 21st century. Upon successful completion of this course, the student will be able to: state the role of civil engineers in society; list significant achievements and key engineers that have contributed to the development of our built environment; explain how the profession is regulated and practiced; describe key issues related to sustainable development and the associated responsibilities of the engineer; and discuss the major contemporary issues involving civil

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

name.zh: 高分子表面處理與加工
name.en: Polymers applied to surface treatment and processing

description.zh: 講授基本的高分子反應原理及應用範圍，並針對高分子在表面加工方面的相關理論知識，並進行小型實驗驗證所學知識，同時安排公司參訪及業界人士講授業界經驗及需求，使學生了解高分子在實務上的真正應用、及在表面加工領域的實用性與未來性。內容包括1.	高分子材料概論2.	高分子的應用範圍3.	高分子表面處理之應用4.	高分子表面處理之技術5.	表面特性的檢測6.	高分子表面處理的簡易實驗7.	高分子在表面加工的實務應用與經驗演講8.	公司參訪-高分子表面處理
description.en: The synthesis and applications of polymer will be introduced as well as the knowledge of polymeric surface treatment technology. Experiments, speeches and factor tours relative to polymeric surface treatment will arranged for further understanding. The contents are as follow:1.	Introduction of Polymer Materials2.	Applications of Polymers3.	Application on surface treatment4.	Technologies of polymer surface treatments5.	Surface Characterization6.	Experiments7.	Speeches8.	Factor tours

description.zh: 本課程就化工分離程序在生物技術產品回收之應用進行理論及實務上之說明，其中程序包括、膜過濾、蛋白質沉澱、吸附及結晶等以及管柱層析等。
description.en: This course is to learn the bioseparation techniques, including membrane filtration, protein precipitation adsorption, crystallography, etc., by the application of some chemical engineering processes.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

name.zh: 細胞生理反應之檢測原理與技術
name.en: Principles and Techniques to Test Cell physiology

description.zh: 本課程設計著重於實務操作與原理之探討，並藉由結果現象之觀察來使學生了解人體生理及醫學現象。主軸包括(1)檢視細胞之代謝與生長表現:細胞之生長好與壞可由其代謝途徑與生長速度判斷。本課程將把細胞培養在不同環境下，觀察並定量其代謝活性、生長速度及代謝產物。 (2)細胞形態之定性觀察:不同組織之內部細胞，其形態不一。本課程將介紹以不同物理/化學之方法來觀察細胞形態，使學生熟悉不同生理組織中細胞之形態之差異及其與其組織生理特性之關聯。學期中將邀請校外學者及業界人士演講此些技術在業界與學術界之應用及實務性。本課程之分類大綱如下:1.   細胞代謝與細胞活性+實驗 (測細胞活性)2.   探討細胞生長因素+實驗 (計算細胞數目)3.   蛋白質與DNA在細胞中的角色+實驗(定量DNA)4.  細胞之代謝中間與最終產物(RNA與蛋白質) +實驗(定量細胞產物與ELISA原理)5.    不同生理組織之特性+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(螢光染色))6. 細胞外觀與生理特性之關聯+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(切片染色))7.    生醫材料與細胞組織交互作用之實例探
description.en: This course focuses on hands-on training of basic cell laboratory skills. The purpose is to help students understand cell physiology. The main curriculum contains 1. measuring cell growth and metabolism; 2. observing cell morphology. There will also be speakers from the industry and academic institutes to talk about more specific applications.The class contains the following topics:1.	Cell metabolism and viability (Experiment: measure cell viability)2.	Cell growth (Experiment: Cell counting)3.	Proteins and DNA (Experiment: DNA quantification)4.	Cell intermediate and final products (Experiment: quantification of cellular products and ELISA)5.	Tissue physiology (Experiment: fluorescent stain of cells)6.	Cell morphology (Experiment: histological stain of cells)Cellular interactions with biomedical materials.

description.zh: 地質學是自然科學的一門，是研究地球這個人類所居住的星球自生成以來，組成的物質成分與結構之變化的科學。由於地質學主要是由現在所觀察得到的自然現象去推論現在地球中岩石的組成與結構，並用逆推(Retrodiction)的推論來解釋過去發生在地球之中的各種變化。因此野外觀察為地質學研究的最基本工作。在野外觀察時所用的方法與所依據的原則與理論，即是野外地質學學習的重點。本課程之內容除複習野外地質學與地質調查的一般觀念及基本原理，包括野外地質學導論，火成岩、沉積岩與變質岩地區的地質現象與地質調查的方法外，還將進一步建立區域地質圖測製的能力，以便未來能將地質調查的能力應用於各個相關領域。
description.en: Geologic fieldwork is the basic ability for all geological studies, whether they are simply intended to describe the rocks by various field methods, or whether they form the basis of interpretive studies based upon laboratory analysis of rock samples and geochemical and geophysical data collected in the field. Such data cannot be interpreted without detailed observations of the field relationships between collected samples and of the geology of areas in which measurements were made.Professer Tucker had said that "The study of field geology is often an exciting and rewarding occupation. However, to get the most out of these rocks, it is necessary to undertake precise and accurate fieldwork. The secret of successful fieldwork is a keen eye for detail and an enquiring mind. Be observant, see everything in the outcrop, then think about the things seen and look again."This course is designed as advanced training to field observation, description and geologic mapping for graduate student
