description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: Modular Talks by Prestigious Scientific or Industrial Pionee

description.zh: 本課程每學期擬邀請科技或產業界傑出人士5-6位，在其專業領域進行為期2-3週的專題講課；主要是為了拓展博碩士生進入職場前的視野，對年輕學生給予指標式的誘導與激勵。
description.en: Modular serial talks are designed for senior-level or PhD-program postgraduate students. The high-power speakers will be strictly selected and invited either from scientific organizations or from industry. The course aims to broaden students' vision on various professional aspects, as well as to inspire their creactivities both in research and development.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 1. 電力與能源2.節能與儲能 3.能源應用與環境4.能源監控技術5.能源管制技術 6.能源管理
description.en: 1. Power and Energy 2.Energy Control and Storage3.Energy Application and Environment4.Energy Monitoring Technology 5.Energy Control Technology 6.Energy Managements.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解排隊理論之基本概念及分析方法，並據以分析通訊網路或計算機網路之效能。課程內容包含：(1)排隊理論簡介 (2)相關機率理論 (3)基本排隊模式 (4)各種排隊模式分析 (5)排隊理論應用於各種通訊網路及計算機網路之效能分析。
description.en: This course contains the Introduction of Queueing Theory, Related probability theory, Fundamental Queueing models, Queueing models analysis: M/M/1, M/M/c, M/E/1, M/G/1, G/M/1 etc. This course also contains the performance evaluation of communications networks and computer networks based on the queueing theory.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

notes: 星期一 (2教107) 星期四(2教207)

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 本課程首先將建立學生對原子模型的觀念，進而學習相關核反應、中子物理及核反應器物理之相關基本知識。內容包括：物質基本概念、原子模型發展、物質與波、電子軌域、化學鍵、量子數、鮑立不相容原理、氫原子模型、質能不滅、守恆定律、原子與核、核反應、放射線與衰變、放射性與物質作用等。
description.en: The purpose of this lecture will firstly help the students to establish the concept of atomic model. It will further provide students to lean the fundamental knowledge in nuclear reactions, neutron physics, and nuclear reactor physics. Basic material and concept to be covered are: atomic model evolution, matter and wave, electronic orbits, chemical bond, quantum number, Pauli exclusion principle, hydrogen model, conservation law, atom and nucleus, nuclear reaction, radiation and decay, interaction between radiation and matter,…etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機率基本觀念及數理隨機變數、工程常用的機率分佈函數、量測數據與參數估算、迴歸及相觀分析、可靠度之分析及運用、電腦模擬(蒙地卡羅)技術。
description.en: Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling Distribution, Maximum LikelihoodModel Fitting, Confidence Tolerance and Prediction intervals, Regression Analysis, Introduction to Monte Carlo Methods.

description.zh: 1.電學:電力線, 電位場, 庫侖力, 電阻率, 電流分佈, 超導電性, 尖端放電, 電偶極, 極化, 介電性, 介電材料, 壓電性, 壓電材料, 掃描式與穿隧式電子顯微鏡, 電場屏蔽。2.磁學: 電流磁效應, 磁力線, 帶電粒子之運動, 霍耳效應, 高斯計, 質譜儀, 磁偶極, 磁滯, 磁性材料, 磁路設計, 超導材料與元件, 核磁共振成像, 磁場屏蔽。3.電磁場與電磁波：電磁感應, 渦電流, 電磁波, 偏極化, 反射與折射, 波導管, 微波濾波器, 天線, 無線通訊, 電磁屏蔽。
description.en: 1.Electricity: Electric field, potential, Coulomb force, Resistivity, current, superconductivity, point discharge, electric dipole, electric polarization,dielectric, dielectric materials, piezoelectricity, piezoelectric materials, scanning electron microscope and scanning tunneling microscope  (SEM & STM), electrostatic shielding. 2.Magnetics: Biot-Savart Law, magnetic flux, motion of a charged particle in magnetic field, Hall effect, Gauss meter, Mass spectrometer, magnetic dipole, Hysteresis, magnetic materials, magnetic circuit, superconducting materials and devices, nuclear magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), magnetic shielding. 3.Electromagnetic fields and waves: Electromagnetic induction, eddy currents, electromagnetic waves, polarization, reflection and refraction, wave guides, microwave filters, antenna, wireless communications, electromagnetic shielding.

description.zh: RFID技術標準，RFID市場與應用趨勢，RFID資訊系統與管理，RFID系統發展與應用，RFID資訊倫理與隱私，其他。
description.en: Protocols and standards of RFID, RFID markets and application trends, informative management system of RFID, RFID system development and applications, RFID informational ethics and privacy, others.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

notes: 機電所碩一同學98第二學期修習

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

name.zh: 全球製造體系協同系統特論
name.en: Special Topic on Collaborative Systems for Global Manufactur

description.zh: 第一部分是針對製造業內部運作時所需的Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)系統平台與Product Data Management (PDM)系統平台所提供的功能進行介紹，並進行實作演練。第二部分則是針對資訊系統整合之概念、架構與相關技術，包括Application Programming Interface (API)、Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)、Master Data Management (MDM)、Web Service、Agent等進行說明。第三部分則是針對建立協同系統時所需之相關核心平台所提供的功能進行介紹，並進行實作演練。
description.en: This course contains three main portions. First, the core intranet systems applied to most manufacturers, such as ERP and PDM systems are introduced and practiced. Second, the concepts, frameworks, and technologies for system integrations, such as API, EAI, MDM, Web Service, and Agent are explained. Finally, the kernel system utilized to construct collaborative systems for global manufacturing operations is introduced and practiced. The objective of this course is to make students to familiar with various platforms for constructing global collaborative systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意工程最佳化方法導論，線性規畫法，非線性規畫法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規畫法介紹，機械元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods,Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization,Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Technigues,Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2.探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3.進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4.學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由(7)資訊安全
description.en: This course provides a comperhensive overview of several topics related to mobile computing. These topics includes:(1)State-of-Art in Mobile (2)Data Management (3)Mobile Database and Transaction Management (4)Location Management, (5)Mobile IP (6)Unicast/Multicast Routing,and(7)Security.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

name.zh: 太陽光電池製作技術與原理
name.en: Solar Cell Manufacturing Technology and Principal

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於太陽能電池製作技術及基本原理的認識。從太陽能電池的工作原理、太陽能電池電極材料的製備、太陽能電池電極（陰極、陽極）的製作、太陽能電池的組裝、太陽能電池界面的分析到太陽能電池效率的量測等讓學生有系統的接觸與太陽能電池相關的各種知識。課程中將提供學生進行太陽能電池的實作。
description.en: The course "Solar Cell Manufacturing Principal and Technology" aims to provide the basic knowledge in the fabrication of solar cells, including the solar cell operation principle, the preparation of solar cell materials, electrode, device assembling, interface analysis, and efficiency measurement. Several experiments related to solar cell technology are also arranged.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

name.zh: 室內空氣環境品質檢測實驗

description.zh: 本課程內容概要：一、目標：建立本系大學部及研究所同學在〔永續健康建築〕之實驗課程中，實際操作檢測實驗之專業知識與能力。二、背景︰近年來台灣位居環境之室內空氣品質(Indoor Air Quality)問題越趨嚴重，良好的居住健康環境為不可或缺的環節。本系對應室內空氣品質管理，積極測量各種不同種類建築的室內空氣品質。針藉由本課程之教學實驗儀器，避免經過繁複危險的化學直接確保操作師生的安全，實驗過程，也不需要耗費大量經費建立高安全標準的固定場所實驗室，可經由機動性高隨身型儀器的實地建築環境之檢測以及數據直讀的分析，讓學生直接而明白地瞭解到日常生活空間內充斥的各種健康威脅，以及如何針對健康建築與健康生活目標進行規劃，並可以將操作實驗之成果與建築師事務所之規劃設計方案結合，並提供實務界工程技術上之建議。
description.en: a

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標為培養學生具備特用化學品基本知識、合成方法及應用原理。特用化學品種類包括：電子用特化品、塑膠用特化品、紡織用特化品及其他工業之特化品（如界面活性劑）。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicines, etc. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

notes: 需具備高等分子生物學的先備知識基礎

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies.  Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 電腦結構簡介，電腦介面與標準，量測訊號處理包括溫度與壓力計等，資料收集系統簡介，資料處理簡介，網路簡介及控制機構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to computer structure, computer interface and the interface standards, measurements including temperature and pressure, introduction data acquisition system, introduction to data control, network system, and the computer control mechanisms.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 本課程針對電腦初學者所設計，課程依照初學者最需要的電腦入門知識和技能，從基本的網路原理及、網路資源教起，讓同學可以充份掌握並利用並利用網路資源。本課程亦教授網頁編輯觀念教您如何規劃網站架構、再加上互動式表單及動態網頁效果的完整說明,讓同學也能製作出具有專業水準的網站。本課程分為「電腦基礎」和「網際網路」等二部份：(1) 電腦基礎篇：介紹最熱門的網路觀念與操作技巧，內容涵括知識性的網路相關知識，包括網路與Internet發展，以及資訊安全等題材；另外還有操作性的課題，包括WWW與網路搜尋、E-mail電子郵件、HTML網頁製作、FTP檔案傳輸與網站發佈等；學會上網找資料、收發電子郵件、使用即時通訊軟體。(2) 網際網路篇：學會製作個人網頁等技巧。製作網頁以FrontPage中文版的各項基本功能為主，內容包括網站的建立、圖文網頁編輯、表格與超連結、導覽列與共用邊框、分割框架與多媒體互動網頁設計，以及網站的發佈與管理等，讓同學可以完整學習利用FrontPage來編製網頁的編輯技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for the students who want to handle the resource of internet. The is course composed of two parts:（1）The concept of internet and the application program（2）Learning how to build up the website by using Microsoft FrontPage.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 深耕趨勢學理論，以生活型態資訊為基礎，探討社會趨勢與科技發展趨勢，做為商品企畫的基礎。本課程旨在引導學習者運用學術研究的工具，以科學的方法定義市場需求，並以理性的思維進行商品企畫。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development followed by product planning practice. The aims of this course is to put emphasis on conducting research approach in the process of scientific marketing management and reasonable product planning.

description.zh: 本課程係提供博士生探索在設計領域中進行研究與建構知識的哲學基礎，碩士生經授課教師同意亦可選修。探討議題包括認識論、現象學、實用論、符號交互論與建構論，並比較設計研究與其它領域的研究。修課者將選讀哲學、認識論或理論的重要文獻，以及有關設計哲理的重要文獻，且將本課程的學習成果以參與學術活動或設計競賽等方式發表。
description.en: This is designated as a Doctoral course. Master students may join the course based on approval of the instructor. This course explores the philosophical basis for conducting research and building knowledge in the field of design. Topics to be explored may include core concepts from epistemology, phenomenology, pragmatism, symbolic interactionism and structuralism. Comparisons are made between design research and research in other fields. Each participant in the course will choose key readings: some from works in philosophy, epistemology or theory, and others related to discussions of philosophy in design. The readings may be a book in its entirety or selected chapters from a book that may present a philosophical argument or an extended discussion (of the nature of knowledge, time, actions, experience, cognition, context, technology, language, interactions, artifacts or objects), or one (or more) selected chapter(s) from a compendium or other edited collection of classic and contemporar

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

description.zh: 模型理論,管流理論,渠流理論,渠變理論,數值理論.
description.en: Introduction,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel  flow,Gradually varied flow(Backwatercomputation...),Computation fluid mechanics(ex:FDM,FEM,...)

name.en: Writing and presentation in the Technical Field

description.zh: 1. 工程寫作的基本技巧 工程寫作結構、段落、圖表的製作 國際單位與標點符號2. 升學與求職之寫作 簡歷表、自傳與讀書計畫、推薦信 碩士推甄注意事項3. 論文與職場之寫作 論文寫作項目與格式、參考文獻 備忘錄、會議記錄、產品說明書之寫法4. 口語表達之藝術 簡報、投影片製作 簡報面談注意事項5. 科技人的人文寫作
description.en: 1. Basic Writing Techniques Structures, paragraph, tables and graphics in the technical writing Engineering units and punctuations2. Writing for Application of Schools or Finding Jobs Writing of resume, autobiography, letter of recommendation and study plan Tips on application to graduate schools3. Thesis and Work Writing Items and format of a thesis Writing of references, memo and minutes of meeting4. Oral Presentation Making of films by PowerPoint Tips on interviewing skills5. Literature Writing by Technical Person

description.zh: 讓學生了解創業的困難與最重要的考量，並經由學期計畫完成一個週期的訓練。1.	創業企業家之人格特質2.	創業機會之發掘與價值評量3.	企業成長路徑之預想4.	企劃細節a、	產品企劃b、	產品開發c、	生產企劃d、	行銷企劃e、	組織與人力f、	資金與財務計畫g、	第一階段之執行計畫h、	企劃書撰寫與簡報
description.en: Objective : letting student understand the process of new start-up planning, with a semester project to complete one round of training.Course Syllabus 	Entrepreneur characters 	New business opportunity identification and value appraisal 	Business growth path examining 	New start-up planning process 	Product planning 	Product development 	Production planning 	Sales and marketing planning 	Organization and human resources 	Financial planning 	Execution plan of the first year 	Writing and presenting the business proposal

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討服務行銷的重要內容，包括顧客行為、關係行銷、行銷策略設計與服務品質模式探討及顧客滿意度研究。課程將配合實例進行討論。
description.en: This course is to discuss some important topics of service marketing:  Consumer Behavior, Relationship Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Service Quality Model and Customer Satisfaction.  The course  contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in service marketing practice.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技不但改變了人類的生活，也改變了消費習慣與行銷通路。電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有86%有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and as the idea of internet consumption disseminates gradually, the internet business transaction market of consumers' side also becomes an important internet business area. As the portal site operators think the environment of internet shopping in Taiwan as mature, now not only the B2C market seems full of potential, the C2C trend is also no

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程TRIZ研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使"突破創新"輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管(經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場(或未來進入職場)解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information system, information technology, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程之要旨在於建構高科技產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場預測擴展之研究能力。課程中引用各種研究方法及預測手法並以個案探討方式配合。
description.en: The objective of this course is to construct the infrastructure of high technology industry analysis and to build up the research capability. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討競爭優勢與生產系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、 競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。進而以精實思維(lean thinking)為基礎，探討實現精實企業體的方向及議題，包括精實之基本步驟:消除浪費、暢流、後拉、完善，精實思考架構:理念 流程、員工與事業夥伴、解決問題。 基礎工具如價值溪流圖(value stream mapping)等將用來案例實作。
description.en: In this course, we first cover the linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models. Topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. Then, the course will explore the approaches and issues of realizing lean enterprise based on lean thinking. Topics included are the basic steps to become lean and the framework of lean thinking. The basic steps to become lean are wastes removing, smoothing, pull and perfection. The framework of lean thinking is often depicted as the 4P model: philosophy, processes, partnership, and problem solving.  Basic tools such as value stream mapping will be introduced.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流，因此國外廠商紛紛上網卡位，網路商業化已成為一股不可抵擋的趨勢。本課程中將介紹對電子商務作理論與實務上的探討。1. 電子商務與商業模式2. 電子商務策略發展3. B to C電子商務4. C to C電子商務5. B to B電子商務6. 無線網路7. 企業電子化8. 企業資源規劃9. 供應鏈管理10. 顧客關係管理11知識管理與e-Learning12. 網路行銷14. 網路廣告與關鍵字廣告15. 網路安全性
description.en: E-business (electronic business) is the conducting of business on the Internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners.The outline of electronic business is as following:1. Introduction to Electronic Commerce.2. Technology Infrastructure: The Internet and the World Wide Web.3. Selling on the Web: Revenue Models and Building a Web Presence.4. Marketing on the Web.5. Business-to-Business Online Strategies6. Online Auctions, Virtual Communities, and Web Portals.7. The Environment of Electronic Commerce: Legal, Ethical, and Tax Issues.8. Web Server Hardware and Software.9: Electronic Commerce Software.10. Electronic Commerce Security.11. Payment Systems for Electronic Commerce.12. Planning for Electronic Commerce

name.zh: 人類資訊處理理論與應用
name.en: Human Information Processing Theories and Applications

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解人類認知過程之資訊處理理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用這些理論與模式來探討與提升整體系統之績效。
description.en: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and models of human information processing with the consideration of task and environment characteristics, and to learn how to apply these theories and models for investigating and improving overall system performance.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，搭配四階品質機能展開，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。

TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

name.zh: 進階家具與室內設計(一)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Furniture and Interior Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 英文授課,僅限碩士班40人選修

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

description.zh: 傳統電廠與核電廠比較、核電廠發電原理、NSSS、BOP、壓力槽與內部組件、核燃料與控制棒、核電廠控制系統、熱傳與冷卻系統、屏蔽與多重防禦、圍阻體、餘熱移除之系統、中子偵檢、第四代反應器、其他安全系統、等。
description.en: The course contents include: basis of nuclear power plant, NSSS, BOP, reactor pressure vessel and internal components, nuclear fuel and control rod assembly, reactor control, heat transfer and coolant system, shielding and multilayer containments, residual heat removal system, neutron detection system, other safety related system, Gen-IV reactors, … etc.

description.zh: 修習內容包含：核能科技演進對人類的啟發、核能與輻射、輻射線與物質之互應作用、核能基本理論、核能應用與核能發電原理、以及核反應器原理。
description.en: The contents of this course consists of: the evolution of the nuclear technology, nuclear energy and radiations, interactions of radiation with matters, basic nuclear theory, nuclear applications and the basic working mechanisms of the nuclear power generation, and nuclear reactor theory.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 從人類、社會、人文學上探討人性、設計倫理與資源、經濟之關係，建立設計之推行及正確理念。
description.en: Lecture on the development of prime influences on design domestically and internationally, with emphasis on the work of key industrial designers. Discussion sessions with reading assignments will be carried out through the course, and submission of a written report is required.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生利用寒暑假期赴設計相關產業實習，實習期程至少50天，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經PPT實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 50 days. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral P.P.T. presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

name.zh: 逆向工程與快速原型（一）
name.en: Reverse Engineering and  Rapid prototyping Practice （一）

description.zh: 從點群掃描、建構曲面、實體、分析與檢測並轉出Stl檔等逆向工程流程到快速原型加工原理、系統分類做實務介紹與製造
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques used in Reverse Engineering (RE). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of RE, 3D measurement principles, surface digitization strategies, curve and surface modeling and the introduction of rapid prototyping system.

description.zh: 針對存貨理論之簡單介紹，課程內容為確定性模式之經濟批量，連續性與週期性盤點策略，動態性模型與多階段系統。
description.en: Introduced simply in view of the goods in stock theory, curriculum content economy of batch for definite pattern, continuous and periodic inventory strategy, dynamic model and multi-stage system.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 本課程藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Universal Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 本課程係初級日文(一)、(二)的延續，再利用半年一學期的時間，繼續增強學生對日語的興趣，加強學生對日語的簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識日本及日語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。授課內容：日常生活之對話、童謠、歌曲及民俗文化等。
description.en: This is a continue course of Primary Japanese(I) and (Ⅱ). Students are expected to keep their interests in study Japanese language, further improve their communication skills, better understand Japanese culture, and become globalization. The course contains: daily conversation, folk songs, music and traditional culture of Japan.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 中國的古玉除了被儒家視為君子的象徵外，在禮制上有崇高的地位。通過玉器的形制、紋飾和功能的研究，有助於明瞭三代的原始宗教和儀式生活，以及東周以來的巫術信仰。所以，玉器雖是具體的器物藝術，卻也是構成精神信息的主要載體，它豐富而神秘地反映了古代中國形上的精神文化。本課程擬結合文物考古與文化美學的視角，以歷代相關文獻、文學作品為素材，輔以近來出土的玉器圖片，對古人用玉觀念，用玉行為作一重點呈現。一則次第凸顯「玉」於古代中國歷經法器、禮器、服飾器各階段的人文內涵以及其為中國文化之一核心單元的本質；一則期使學習者嘗試由「物相」本身來體察古人心靈的趨向，從而體悟美的「器物」是人類的創作，也是對永恆、無限的憧憬與捕捉。課程內容包括五部分：(一)、從「物理境」轉入「心理場」論述(二)、史前～兩漢墓葬玉用法介述(三)、春秋戰國以還「玉」之德化(四)、唐宋以還「玉」之俗化(五)、古典文學中的玉石意象 (六)、古玉之品賞及其他
description.en: Chinese jade has long been regarded by Confucianists as the symbol of gentlemen, enjoying a highly respected status. Through the study on the shape, the incised decoration and the function of the jade, we can understand the primitive religion and the ritual life in the Three Dynasties, as well as the witchcrafts practiced since Eastern Chou. As an art form, the jade is a concrete object, but in effect it embodies the spiritual life of people, enriching and reflecting the metaphysical aspects of culture, which serves as a starting point for exploring aesthetic concepts. This course aims to integrate authropological and cultural aesthetic perspectives. With the assistance of the recently unearthed jade, the emphasis is put on ancient people's idea of jade and their usage of it. It is hoped to guide students to conceptualize the spiritual life of ancient people and further realize that objects are the things which motivate our creativity, inspire our imagination.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹科學技術之重要成就及其發展，使學生對科技有一具體的認識。社會變遷、思考模式、文化發展等，影響科技的發展極大，而相關問題的探討，可使學生認識科技發展的特色及其優缺點，並引導其思考何以近兩三百年來科技衰落的原因，并尋求正確的發展方向。
description.en: he course will systematically introduce the development and important achievements of ancient technology so that students will have a profound understanding of it.  Besides, since social changes, the mode of thinking, cultural development, etc. are closely related to the development of technology, these topics will also be discussed.  In this way, students will have a more comprehensive understanding of the characteristics, advantages, and disadvantages of technology.  Hopefully, they may try to inquire why the development of technology has lagged behind in these 300 years and may start to find a perspective course for the development of technology in the future.

description.zh: 網路資源運用是現代人生的一部份，但不當利用網路或為犯罪工具的例子屢見不鮮，本課程擬探討網路誹謗、網路色情、駭客攻擊以及網路交際的安全性等，期望在個案的討論中培養學生正確利用網路資源的觀念，進一步落實法治教育。
description.en: To use internet resources is already part of the life for every modern people; however, the cases of using internet as the criminal tool are not rare. Thus, this course is going to discuss the law issues that are spread out from the application of internet, which including: internet slander, internet pornography. Hacker attack and electronic bank, electronic shopping, electronic business. Hope we can help our students to develop the right conception to use internet resources through case study, and further more to carry out the law education.

description.zh: 以深入淺出、活潑互動的方式，先帶領學生透過單元主題的討論，逐步認識佛學，正確地了解佛教的人生觀、宇宙觀、倫理觀及解脫觀等義理。在具備一定的理論基礎之後，再深入地與學生分享如何將這些學到的教理實際運用於日常生活，好讓自己獲得身心的安頓，創造光明喜悅的人生。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to help students to know Buddhism progressively by way of explain the profound theories in simple terms. After possessing certain Buddhist knowledge, the course's purpose will turn to the application of Buddhism in the daily life. We hope that after showing the right way of practicing the Buddhist teachings could help students to lead a joyful life.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

description.zh: 法律向來給人艱澀難懂的感覺，然而它確是與我們日常生活習習相關的一門學科，借錢、購物與結婚是民法；至行政機關洽公是行政法；參與經濟活動是商事法…。本課程欲藉由生活中的點滴事例來說明法律，並讓學生能充分瞭解學習法律技能並非遙不可及，而它是一門實用且有趣的學科。
description.en: Law is a subject that always gives people a feeling of difficulty understanding; however, it is indeed closely link with our daily life.  Borrowing money, shopping or marriage is civil law; talking business with Civil Service is administrative law; joining economical activity is economical law.  This course explains the law by the thing which happened in everyday life.  And also let students believe that learning law skill is not impossible but useful and interesting.

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生明瞭中國及西洋人生哲學的歷史發展，並介紹人生哲學的內在涵義，分別探究人的意義、特性、人性論、真善美聖等問題；兼及人生哲學的當代意義：包括各種人生觀、生命的尊嚴、愛與婚姻及修養等探究。使知、情、意能融為一體，藉以確立個人理性的生命追尋目標。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to enable students to realize historical development in Chinese and Western philosophy of life by introducing the inner connotation of philosophy of life and studying the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life, humanism, virtue, good and beauty, etc..  Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 唐代為中國文學極盛之時代，而其光彩足以越邁古今者，莫若詩歌。唐詩有古體、近體之分，近體詩分五言律、七言律、五言絕、七言絕四種。本課程之教授以近體詩為主。唐近體詩之作者極多，本課程之教授以最有名之詩人與詩篇為主。除強調多讀多背之外，尚教以吟唱練習，教授內容有宜蘭酒令、天籟調、福建調，與江西調。
description.en: Tang Dynasty marks the climax of the Chinese literature.  Of all the literary genres, the achievements of Tang poetry, in particular, are superior to that of any other period. Tang poetry has two different styles: archaic and contemporary.  The contemporary style includes five-word lu, seven-word lu, five-word chueh, seven-word chueh, the best of which are the foci of this course.  In addition to reading and memorization, the practice of poem-singing is emphasized.  The contents include: Yi-lan chiu-lin, Tien-lai Tiao, Fu-kien Tiao, and Kiang-si Tiao.

description.zh: 就人類歷史的發展而言，語言早於文字，而歌謠則是韻律化的語言，因此歌謠作為時代的見證與記錄，也早於文字，所以歌謠史可呈現最具體的歷史變革。台灣早期的原住民社會，歌謠既娛神又娛人，又具社交功能。隨著漢人農業移民的進入，在農業社會中，歌謠與詩歌、戲劇，乃至歲時祭儀密不可分；進入近代社會，都市化、工業化帶動唱片工業的發展，近百年台灣流行歌謠的發展史，反映不同世代的政治社會環境，也成了人們心情最真實的寫照。透過歌謠去回顧過去，無疑是充滿趣味與感性的。
description.en: Languages are developed earlier than written symbols in the history of human development. Songs are a rhythmic form of language. They record and reflect human histories before written symbols are invented. The history of songs can therefore best show specific historical changes. In early years of Taiwan aboriginal society, songs were used to entertain both gods and people and had social functions. As Han people brought in agriculture from mainland China, songs, poetry, and theater had closely related to sacrificial rites. In modern history, the development of recording history was driven by urbanization and industrialization. Taiwan pop songs in the past hundreds of year have reflected different political and social status in different generations and have portrayed the most truthful images in people's mind. Studying history through songs will be no doubt interesting.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為人文科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover human science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.
